title: Shadow's Kiss
description: This edition was previously published under the ASIN B072MMJFN3 A violent storm. Unending night . . . Violet Archer is running through the darkness, for her very life. A single spark blazes, calling to her. It is her chance at salvation. It is a connection beyond any she could have ever imagined. And it leads her to a lonely cabin in the woods.But when Violet wakes, she has no memory of who she is or how she got there. She is disturbingly ill. And worst still, a chilling evil creeps through her veins. Her host, the tall and powerful Elijah Stone, sees her for the enemy she is. He has no choice but to end her. Yet a cataclysmic bond, neither can deny, stays Elijahâ€™s hand. Radiants, immortals of the Light, have been warring with their enemies, the Shadows, for millennia. Now, twisted together by fate, the two adversaries must embark on a journey. One on which their very lives depend. But it turns out that Violet and Elijah are not alone on their quest. And they soon realize they are being hunted along the way. It seems Violet has a dark debt to settle . . .~An epic fantasy adventure. Mysterious circumstances. Fun. Dark and steamy. Blending the best of adult paranormal romance and urban fantasy . . . you don't want to miss this series.~
author: T.M. Hart
